definitions.definition: To declare formally, officially or ceremoniously.
definitions.example: I hereby pronounce you man and wife.

definitions.definition: To declare authoritatively, or as a formal expert opinion.
definitions.example: The doctor pronounced them legally dead.
The judge had pronounced often before, but never in front of such a crowd.

definitions.definition: To sound out (a word or phrase); to articulate.
To produce the components of speech.
definitions.example: Actors must be able to pronounce perfectly or deliberately disabled.
